byline.original: By RICHARD BEALES and ROBERT COLE

abstract: Reuters BreakingViews column notes Tesla may take about 2.5 percent of electric vehicle market by 2025; notes of 200 largest public companies worldwide, top-notch group of 50 are on course to deliver average 20 percent increase in earnings in next 12 months.
snippet: Morgan Stanley analysts are saying Tesla may take roughly 2.5 percent of the electric vehicle market by 2025.
lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley analysts are saying Tesla may take roughly 2.5 percent of the electric vehicle market by 2025.

headline.print_headline: Growth at Tesla Could Be Extreme
